name: Grandma's Room (Douzane)
description:
Grandma’s room is a puzzle-based game, where you must uncover the truth about your grandmother and grandfather's pasts. The whole game run’s in the same room, and each level has a different room puzzle and history puzzle.

Developed for the IFRJAM 2019.1

Synopsis

In Grandma's Room, you'll incorporate Eduardo, a young man in times gone by. He is selected after a long family discussion, he was selected to be in charge of taking care of his grandmother, Margô, who began to worsen from her physical and psychological illnesses.

— DATE
March 2019.
